alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Lee; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ogle, northeastern Lee and De Kalb Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 645 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rochelle, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... DeKalb, Sycamore, Rochelle, Shabbona, Cortland, Hinckley, Waterman, Maple Park, Malta, Paw Paw, Creston, Lee and Steward. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 83 and 103. I-88 between mile markers 77 and 101. This includes... Northern Illinois University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
